nodes.text: The Droid Crush Pirates of Bestoon were a droid pirate organization associated with Bestoon and led by a droid captain. The Droid Crush Pirates were tasked by the Sith assassin Ochi of Bestoon in hunting the Sith Lord Darth Vader on Mustafar, having been promised with the high-quality technology within Vader's armor. After retrieving his lightsaber, Vader destroyed the captain and the rest of the droids present.
